summary: How do agencies ensure that their data is transparent, accessible, and of sufficient quality for policy-making and informing the public? Federal laws and guidance have outlined several actions agencies can take to implement "data governance"—a framework of organizational structures and supports intended to help agencies improve the quality and availability of data. The four agencies we reviewed made progress establishing data governance. We made recommendations...
title: Data Governance: Agencies Made Progress in Establishing Governance, but Need to Address Key Milestones
